messages.message: Doing well! Long time no talk. How have you been?
Super, just took a job at Charles Schwab.
Oh yeah? Doing what? That is where my company has all of our assets.
Interesting. Access management. I own all your data then.
That's cool. Schwab is a good company. Congratulations on the new job.
Thank you. What have you been up to?
What came of that app you were working on?

Overall been good. I've just been working and trying to obtain the CFA designation. I passed level II in June and have the last level this coming June. 

The app never went anywhere. The company I was working with went under and then dissolved. I just left it alone after that.
Wow that sucks. I worked on an app for 3 years and couldn't get it picked up by the target market.
